title: Have you ever written a letter to any U.S. president and receive a response? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America
History of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Actually, I sent letters to a president and a first lady. They were letters of support and condolence, respectively. I was also a fairly young child a the time. I received printed thank yous on both. I have never sent a significant letter as an adult.
Not a letter. But I requested and received a congratulatory card when my son became an Eagle Scout. They will do that for any Eagle or Gold Award Scout.
